DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine office base surgery effective way cut health care cost maintain patient safety satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Office Based Hand Surgery Using WALANT ( Wide Awake Local Anesthesia No Tourniquet ) : Outcomes Cost Savings Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: The study retrospective chart review prospective patient satisfaction functional outcome survey . Patients office base procedure otherwise could perform outpatient surgical setting January 1 , 2015 December 4 , 2015 contact study enrollment . Patient satisfaction functional outcome survey administer patient consent research study . The data collect include limit : age gender limb dominance , complication co-morbidities .
DOC.criteria: Patients see office base procedure otherwise would perform outpatient surgical setting January 1 , 2015 December 4 , 2015 Kwire hardware removal Closed reduction Patients receive antibiotic time procedure
